alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Las Animas County through 115 PM MDT... At 1248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cokedale, or near Trinidad, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Starkville around 100 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Trinidad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
